Package soccer.common

Provides classes that are used by both soccer server and clients for networking and data parsing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Data
    This interface defines the operations on the data content in a packet.
    Field_Constants
    This class must be the only place for keeping all soccer field hard-coded constants; they all are final.
    TOS_AgentConstants
    This class must be the only place for keeping all TOS player agent final constants.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    This class describes a ball.
    ByeData
    This class wraps a packet used by a player/viewer client to inform the sever that the client is going to leave.
    ClientWorld
    This class provides common features for all client applications in TOS bundle related to the world model
    ConnectData  
    DriveData
    Provides driving data for client controlling the player's movement.
    EmptyData
    This class is an empty packet, used by a viewer client to remind the sever that the client is still active.
    Game_Constants
    This interface defines constants that are used in soccer rules and govern the simulation process.
    HearData
    Provides chat data for client.
    InfoData
    Provides feedback info sent by server to clients about its actions
    InitData  
    KickData
    Provides kicking data for client controlling the player's kicking action.
    MovingObj
    This is a generic template for moving objects such as ball and players.
    MyProperties
    This class adds some customized functionality to it super class
    Packet
    This class defines the specialized UDP soccer packet between server and client.
    PeriodData
    Set the game simulation cycle, mainly affect the game period.
    Player
    This class (together with super class) represents player state vector; these data are transmitted from the server to clients and back.
    RefereeData
    Provides referee data for server informing all clients.
    RWLock  
    SeeData  
    SituationData
    Provides initialization data for server informing the situation data transfer has been completed.
    SndSystem  
    TalkData
    Provides chat data for client.
    TeleportData
    Provides teleportation data for the object controlled by the user
    TOS_Constants
    This interface must be the only place for keeping all TOS project-wide constants.
    Transceiver  
    Util
    Utility static class provides conversion, normalization...
    Vector2d
    A utility class provides 2D vector calculation.
    ViewData  
    World
    This class defines common functionality shared by all applications in TOS bundle related to the world model

Package soccer.common Description

Provides classes that are used by both soccer server and clients for networking and data parsing.
